name: ts_application_template
description: A template for writing an application in TypeScript

scripts.clean: npm run clean:bin && npm run clean:tests
scripts.lint: npm run lint:bin && npm run lint:tests
scripts.build: npm run clean:bin && npm run lint:bin && npm run build:bin
scripts.test: npm run clean:tests && npm run lint:tests && npm run build:tests && mocha --recursive ./dist/tests/

author: Alexander 'Polynomdivision'
